title: Fill in the Blanks - Medium Mode
description: This intermediate-level quiz challenges you to fill in the blanks with the correct French translations of the given Tagalog words or phrases.
instructions: Each sentence contains a blank space where a Tagalog word is provided in parentheses.
Translate the Tagalog word into French and fill in the blank.
Ensure the French word correctly completes the sentence in terms of both meaning and grammatical structure.

items.question: Chaque matin, elle aime boire du _____ chaud. (kape)
Nous devons traverser la _____ pour atteindre l'autre côté de la ville. (ilog)
Le _____ de Noël est décoré de lumières et d'ornements. (puno)
Pour son dîner, il a commandé un grand _____ de viande. (piraso)
Les enfants jouent à l'extérieur sous la _____ du soleil. (sikat)
Il porte toujours son _____ porte-bonheur pour les examens. (anting-anting)
La _____ commence à tomber doucement, couvrant les rues de blanc. (nieve)
Cette recette nécessite l'utilisation de _____ frais. (bawang)
Le _____ dans le ciel cette nuit est particulièrement brillant. (buwan)
Ils ont adopté un _____ de la rue pour lui donner un foyer aimant. (aso)

scoring.10 correct answers: Excellent! Your translation skills are quite impressive.
scoring.7-9 correct answers: Great job! You're almost there, with just a little more practice needed.
scoring.4-6 correct answers: Good effort! You've shown a solid understanding, but room for improvement remains.
scoring.1-3 correct answers: A good start! Keep studying and practicing to enhance your skills.
scoring.0 correct answers: It's a challenging start, but don't give up! Learning a new language takes time and practice.
